definitions.definition: Of a sheep or goat, to make its characteristic cry of baas ; of a human, to mimic this sound.

examples: The last thing we need is to hear them bleating to us about organizational problems.

definitions.definition: Of a person, to say things of little importance to the listener.

main_definition: Of a sheep or goat, to make its characteristic cry of baas ; of a human, to mimic this sound.
secondary_definitions: ( informal , derogatory ) Of a person, to complain .
( informal , derogatory ) Of a person, to say things of little importance to the listener.
